cant you just add it like it was a cd in your sources/list
You can burn your already downloaded to hard drive files to a dvd which will be in /var/cache/apt/archives
and see above aptoncd is very cool..
If you run this it will make a copy of your current sources list..   cp /etc/apt/sources.list ~/Desktop/sources.list.$(date +%m-%d-%Y-%T)
Ah...    If it were me.. I would backup my mbr with dd   I would backup my grub/boot/menu.lst    ..  one of many options would be.. cp /boot/grub/menu.lst ~/Desktop/menu.lst.$(date +%m-%d-%Y-%T)
